programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Chaz Davies races Vicki in BMW's M135i; pitting the new Range Rover against the Rolls-Royce Phantom.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell is at the wheel of Lamborghini's awe-inspiring new Aventador hypercar, Vicki burns through Italy's snowy mountain roads in Mini's brand new Coupe, the team test the latest Porsche.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In this episode of Fifth Gear Tiff Needell and Vicki Butler-Henderson visit sunny South Africa to drive everything from rally cars, to supercars to military vehicles.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason team up with F1 aces Johnny Herbert and Karun Chandhok for the ultimate dogfight. Vicki tests Vauxhall's new compact MPV, the Meriva. Ben samples the motorsport Autograss, and Jonny sees what motoring delights he can find for Â£5000.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki presents the Fifth Gear annual awards for best small, family and fast car, and the show's overall Car of the Year, while Tiff and Jason team up with Fifth Gear new boy Ben Collins to test three closely matched sports cars.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson risks life and limb in the most dangerous car stunt of all - driving a car under a moving lorry. Jonny Smith tests the new Mercedes C Class and its revolutionary seat design.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In the series finale we bring you the ultimate supercar battle when we pitch the awesome McLaren F1 against the almighty Enzo Ferrari. Jason Plato tries his hand at flying a stunt plane.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson is finding out if progress has been made by Mitsubishi, as she races a classic Evo 6 against the very latest Evo 9.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell is joined by Le Mans winner Guy Smith and former rally co-driver Tony Mason to do something that's not as ridiculous as it might sound - caravan racing.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson jets off to Portugal to drive the new Mazda MX5. It's the best selling sportscar in the world, but have Mazda fixed something that wasn't broken.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford tests Nissan's new Micra. He finds it well-made and easy-to-drive. Adrian Simpson goes in search haunted cars. He starts by being very sceptical that haunted cars can exist at all.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell takes two coupes onto the Fifth Gear track - the Mazda RX8 and Nissan 350Z. Vicki Butler-Henderson spends a day with Formula One star Lewis Hamilton. Tom Ford is the lucky man behind the wheel of the facelifted Mercedes SL63 AMG.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki finds out if the new 207 GTi is as exhilarating to drive as the 20 year old hot hatch the 205GTi; Fifth Gear conducts a fascinating world's first crash test.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell meets some of the people whose lives have been blighted by a terror of driving. He then considers the latest solutions to the problem.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki finds out which is quickest - an old Vauxhall against a new one. Jonny Smith and Tom Ford contest one of motor sport's oldest and most gruelling events, the Exeter Trial. Tiff Needell goes to France to drive the new Audi A3 Cabriolet.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford takes puts the Grande Punto Abarth through its hot hatch paces. Tim Shaw finds out if it's possible to save huge amounts of money by servicing your car yourself. Bruno Senna joins the programme as a special guest presenter.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato helps a lottery winner choose a new supercar, Tiff Needell road tests the new Jaguar XK on the best road in the world, and Tom Ford meets Jenson Button at the Geneva Motorshow.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford drives Volvo's stylish new coupe, the C30; and Tiff Needell tests whether a green supercar really can be fun in Lotus' bio-fuel powered Exige 265E.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Adrian Simpson road tests Vauxhall's new Vectra. He finds it very dull to look at inside and out. The 2.2 litre petrol engine feels slow. On the plus side it's better than the model it replaces.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Do cars explode like they do in the movies? Tiff Needell and Adrian Simpson stage their own car chase and then watch the experts who've worked on James Bond movies take over for the special effects.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson makes an unprecedented attempt to hit 200mph in an A1 Grand Prix car. Tom Ford and Jonny Smith take the seven newest hot hatches on sale and decide which is best.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In this special episode of the programme we reveal the winners of the Fifth Gear Awards 2006. There will be prizes for Best Small Car, Best Family Car, Best Fast Car and the overall Car of the Year.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki meets 12 times Motor Trials champion and British motorcycling legend Dougie Lampkin. Jonny investigates another way of making cash from old cars. Jason takes the Ford Focus RS in the first TV drive of Ford's awesome new hot hatch.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: An exclusive insight into America's most glamorous supercar club, based in an underground bunker at a private jet airport, Tiff Needell and Jason Plato race the BMW M3 against the Audi RS4.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell test drives the new Aston Martin V8 Vantage, billed as the most desirable sportscar in the world. Jon Bentley reveals definitively whether expensive petrol is worth the extra cash.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In this edition of Fifth Gear Adrian Simpson will be asking what makes a celebrity car valuable and what doesn't, and he'll be meeting the people who buy them and collect them.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki is the first journalist in the world to drive the astonishing Â£150,000 Gibbs Aquada, an amphibious car that breaks the mould. Vicki tests it out on the open road and the ocean wave.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In a superb world first, Tiff Needell gets to drive a Williams Formula 1 Grand Prix car. With exclusive access to the team we're allowed to follow Tiff every step of the way.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford takes a look at the new Lexus IS 250, and Vicki heads to the track for a special estate shoot out. But who will rise victorious, the Volvo or Subaru?

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff tests this grand tourer's handling through the dramatic scenery of Snowdonia in Wales. Jason Plato tests the brand new Â£115,000 Aston Martin DB9 Volante, one of the fastest cabriolets on sale today.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki tests the Mercedes Vito X or the VW Transporter Sportline on the track to find out which is quickest. Jonny embarks on the 600 mile transcontinental trip in the BMW 635d. Tom drives the ultimate 4x4, the 12 tonne, 10 foot tall Unimog.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Vicki Butler-Henderson will be investigating what improvements mean in practice when they crash a brand new car head-on into a nine-year-old one.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff heads to Anglesey for not one but two Shoot-Outs, the Porsche Cayenne goes head to head with the BMW X5 and the Renault Clio takes on the Honda Civic.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford's been testing the Mazda's new MX5 Roadster Coupe; and Vicki Butler-Henderson has been thrashing Porsche's 911 GT3.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear Vicki Butler-Henderson drives the one-off supercharged Nissan Murano GTC; Jonny Smith challenges the world's biggest lawnmower to a head to head in a grass cutting contest.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom gets an advance look at Formula 1 supremo Bernie Ecclestone's rare and unusual collection of cars. Tiff and Jason take the BMW M3 and the Mercedes C63 AMG to a circuit to determine which is most deserving of its Â£50,000 price tag.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason team up with F1 aces Johnny Herbert and Karun Chandhok for the ultimate dogfight. Vicki tests Vauxhall's new compact MPV, the Meriva. Ben samples the motorsport Autograss, and Jonny sees what motoring delights he can find for Â£5000.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato looks at some of the ultimate attention grabbers that have been tested on Fifth Gear over the past two decades

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato drives a brand new Aston Martin, the whole team test the latest luxury hybrid car from Lexus and Tiff and Jason race head to head on hovercraft.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell blasts through France's champagne region in Aston Martin's latest convertible, Vicki Butler-Henderson acts as umpire in a race between two England cricket stars.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny enters the world of professional drifting as competes in the famous Gatebil show in Norway, driving a specially modified BMW M5. To give himself a fighting chance, he first arranges some tuition from the 2011 British Drift Champion Matt Carter.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and rally driver Mark Higgins set Olympic Skeleton Bob gold medallist Amy Williams and World Pentathlete champion Samantha Murray a track challenge. Expect car damage and the closest ever finish to a Fifth Gear celebrity contest.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell is joined by German petrolhead legend and Queen of the Nurburgring Sabine Schmitz. They're finding the ultimate machine for thrill seekers, pitting the latest Caterham 7 against its hardcore rivals from Morgan and Ariel.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato and Tiff Needell are joined by Ayrton Senna's nephew, Bruno Senna, to conduct their fastest ever track test. They hold a thrilling race between the brand new Porsche 911 Turbo S and two supercar rivals from Noble and Nissan.
